Articles.Content:
A one manned lander with static support struts. (no moving landing gear)And way to much fuel in its ascent stage.

http://www./download/hr6199c7074np8e/Alpha_Lander.craft

Current model of craft on recent mission:

http://i.imgur.com/ORCULjO.jpg

Image of a previous model of the alpha lander made by Rareden.

WARNING this lander has only ever been tested on Minmus Use on other Bodies at your risk.

K.A.T.S.E.N. is not responsible for failure to land safely while using this craft.

I like the Idea of using the struts as landing gear, good shock absorbers.

\
and you can never forget to put the gear down.

Static struts is way much stronger compare with the landing leg/gear.

Hit them with 80m/s they stay there. (but not other parts of your ship)

Landing leg/gear 20m/s they break apart.
